This system monitors your vitals, injecting a burst of synthetic adrenaline into your bloodstream when your body is on the brink of death. You gain a number of additional Resolve Points (depending on the model of your threshold buffer) that you can use or lose only when you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.H51jmhxF9XuwDOE7]{Stable}, such as to avoid death, to stabilize, or to stay in the fight (Core Rulebook 250). These additional Resolve Points donâ€™t count for the purpose of calculating how many Resolve Points you must spend to stabilize, and any unspent additional Resolve Points are lost the next time you take an 8-hour rest to regain your normal Resolve Points.

MODEL RESOLVE POINTS
Mk 1 1
Mk 2 2
Mk 3 3
